(idam kachcheri ka්ramaya meyata hondama udaharanayayi). 1956 balaya laba gath sha්ri lanka nidahas pakshaya pa්ramukha sabhaga rajaya wisin paudgalika anshaya sathu wyapara rajayata pawara ganima saha nawa rajya wyapara athi kirima nisa rajya anshaye sewa niyukthiya shigha්rayen wardhanaya wiya. 1956 sita 1970 dakwama wardhanaya wu rajya wyawasthapitha mandala saha sanstha sewaye atharkika bawa aarambha wanne 1972 athi kala janaraja wyawasthawa samangaya. 1972 dakwama rajya sewaye palanaya wenuwen pawathwagena giya rajya sewa komishan sabhawa ahosi kara rujuwama kabinat mandalaye abhimathaya paridi rajya palanaya karagena ya haki aakarayata wyawasthawa sakas wi thibuni.
